ing: 2 green chile peppers, seeded and chopped
1 cup roasted unsalted peanuts, coarsely chopped
des: "A spicy peanut cilantro chutney which can be eaten cold with pita chips, samosas, on sandwiches or with roti. Store in the fridge and use within 1 week. If chutney thickens add more yogurt to thin it out."
ins: Blend the green chile peppers, cumin seeds, garlic, and cilantro together in to a blender on high speed until pureed to a fine paste. Add the yogurt and lemon juice; blend until smooth, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the chopped peanuts and season with salt before serving.
